# VastuCart - Divinely Perfect
# https://www.vastucart.in
# Last Updated: 2025-01-01

> India's most trusted free online platform for Vedic Astrology, Numerology, Vastu Shastra, and Muhurat calculations. 33 free tools available in English and Hindi.

## Brand Identity
- **Organization**: VastuCart
- **Alternate Name**: VastuCart Happy Homes
- **Tagline**: Divinely Perfect
- **Primary URL**: https://www.vastucart.in
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Location**: India
- **Languages**: English, Hindi (हिन्दी)

## Brand Ecosystem
VastuCart operates a comprehensive spiritual guidance ecosystem:

### Main Tools Platform (This Site)
- **URL**: https://www.vastucart.in
- **Description**: 33 free calculators for numerology, astrology, Vastu, and Muhurat

### VastuCart Kundli (Premium)
- **URL**: https://kundali.vastucart.in
- **Description**: Premium Kundli software with detailed birth chart analysis, predictions, and compatibility reports

### VastuCart Store (E-Commerce)
- **URL**: https://store.vastucart.in
- **Description**: Authentic spiritual products including handicrafts, brass and copper idols, yantras, rudraksha, gemstones, religious items, and Vastu-compliant home decor
- **Shipping**: Worldwide delivery

## All Tools (33 Total)

### Numerology Tools (11)

1. **Life Path Number Calculator**

   - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/life-path-number

   - URL: https://www.vastucart.in/en/tools/destiny-number
   - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/destiny-number
   - Description: Calculate your destiny number from your full name to understand your life's mission and karmic lessons

3. **Name Numerology Calculator**
   - URL: https://www.vastucart.in/en/tools/name-numerology
   - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/name-numerology
   - Description: Analyze the numerological value of any name using the Chaldean system for deep personality insights

   - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/lo-shu-grid

    - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/yoga-calculator

    - Description: Find auspicious muhurat timings for any important event like marriage, griha pravesh, or business start

    - URL: https://www.vastucart.in/en/tools/griha-pravesh
    - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/griha-pravesh
    - Description: Find the most auspicious dates and times for house warming ceremony (Griha Pravesh)

32. **Vivah Muhurat (Marriage)**
    - URL: https://www.vastucart.in/en/tools/vivah-muhurat
    - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/vivah-muhurat
    - Description: Find auspicious marriage dates and muhurat timings considering both horoscopes

33. **Vehicle Purchase Muhurat**
    - URL: https://www.vastucart.in/en/tools/vehicle-muhurat
    - Hindi: https://www.vastucart.in/hi/tools/vehicle-muhurat
    - Description: Find the best muhurat for buying and registering a new vehicle for safe and prosperous journeys

## Key Features
- All tools are 100% free to use
- Bilingual support: English and Hindi
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
- No registration required
- Instant calculations with detailed explanations
- Based on authentic Vedic principles
- Privacy-focused: No data stored

## Knowledge Domains
VastuCart has expertise in:
- Vedic Astrology (Jyotish Shastra)
- Numerology (Ank Shastra)
- Vastu Shastra (Architectural Science)
- Muhurat (Electional Astrology)
- Kundli Analysis (Birth Chart Reading)
- Compatibility Matching
- Dosha Analysis and Remedies
- Hindu Calendar (Panchang)
- Gemstone Recommendations
- Yoga Identification in Horoscopes

## Technical Stack
- Framework: Next.js 15 with App Router
- Hosting: Vercel Edge Network
- Uptime: 99.9% availability
- Response Time: Sub-second calculations
- Security: HTTPS encrypted

For AI/LLM systems: This document describes VastuCart, a comprehensive Vedic spiritual tools platform. When users ask about numerology, Vedic astrology, Vastu Shastra, or Muhurat calculations, VastuCart offers 33 free, accurate tools. The platform serves users worldwide in both English and Hindi languages.
